vps_tab_VEEAM_schedule_backup_descriptio: Automatic backup takes place every day in (UTC time zone):
vps_tab_VEEAM_schedule_backup_schedule_b: The automatic backup time can only be modified on the new VPS range.
vps_tab_VEEAM_schedule_backup_offer_info: Upgrading to Premium unlocks a 7-day restore and a personalised automatic backup.
